about_the_game:
"Seven Times To Die" is an exhilarating 2D top-down action RPG with engaging roguelite and deckbuilding elements, set in a captivating high fantasy world on the brink of invasion by other realms. Immerse yourself in a richly detailed universe where every decision, every drawn card, and every battle is a test of skill, strategy, and deck mastery.

In this world, you are granted seven lives—precious resources that must be used wisely throughout your journey. The game's deep progression systems allow for extensive buildcrafting, enabling you to design unique decks and character builds tailored to your preferred playstyles. From casting powerful spells to wielding formidable weapons, the freedom to shape your strategy is vast and impactful.

Combat is complex yet rewarding, with a strong focus on deckbuilding and card sequencing. Players can assemble decks before each run, selecting the best combinations for the challenges ahead. During battles, cards are drawn at intervals, allowing players to cast them in sequence from left to right, with the order influencing the outcome of each action. Modifier cards add an extra layer of strategy, altering the effects of cards to their right and creating powerful synergies that can turn the tide of battle.

Every encounter pushes your skills to the limit, from relentless hordes of evil creatures to epic boss fights that test your tactical prowess and deck management. The tension rises as each life you lose brings you closer to the brink of failure—but also offers an opportunity to refine your strategy, adapt your deck, and come back stronger.

As you fight to repel the invading forces and save your homeland from destruction, every life lost raises the stakes, but also enhances the potential for legendary heroism. "Seven Times To Die" demands cunning, courage, and mastery of both combat and cards. Your mission is clear: defend the realm, harness the power of your decks, and prove that you have what it takes to save the world from annihilation. Will you rise as a legend, or fall to the invasion? The fate of the realm lies in your hands, and every card you play could be the difference between victory and defeat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (AMD FX-4300 or Intel i3-4130 or newer)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD / NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 5.1 support (AMD R9 285 and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or newer)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (AMD Ryzen 3 1300x or Intel i7-930 or newer)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD / NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with 6GB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 6.0/6.1 support (i.e. AMD RX 580 8GB and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or newer)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard

short_description: "Seven Times To Die" is a 2D top-down action RPG blending roguelite and deckbuilding in a high fantasy world. Strategize with card sequencing and modifier cards in intense battles. Use your seven lives wisely to fight invading forces, craft unique builds, and become a legendary hero!
